website_summaries.verdict: A powerful residential pressure washer that features a convenient push-button electric start with auto-choke for effortless starting.
pros: Like other Generac pressure washers, this model features the Power Dial spray gun and it comes with 4 quick-change nozzles (0°, 25°, 40°, and soap)
The durable, never-flat wheels give you the ability to safely transport the unit across rugged terrain
cons: Occasionally, there are problems with the electric start
If that happens, the unit does have a backup pull start

customer_reviews.title: Not thrilled, poor hose and lousy authorized service.
customer_reviews.text: The electric start on the unit failed after 16 months. I took it generacs authorized dealer, 7 weeks to repair it. The hose is terrible too, it constantly kinks and then blew out. Lucky for me I purchased the Square Trade Warranty. The repair bill was $291. I only use it around my home so maybe it had 10 hours of use time on it. If you are going to buy one don’t get the electric start, the part was impossible for the repair center to locate.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Ciraco

customer_reviews.title: 1-Push Start, great performance and accessories
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this machine around the yard and to clean the algae on my inground pool. It was super easy to assemble, 5 mins max, added oil (included) and gas, plus the 3/4 full battery, and got going in less than 15 mins. The machine has a LOT more power than my old electric pressure washer. As others mentioned, it seems nicely engineered, with no cheap plastic parts (it does have plastic, but seems high quality). Great machine so far, hope it will last. If anything changes I'll update the review.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked for 10 seconds
customer_reviews.text: Just took it out of the box today. Got everything set up and charged the battery. Filled oil, filled fuel, connected hoses, water supply good, and started fine. I stopped the engine to unravel the hose after running for ~10 seconds and the engine would not start after that. I'm told I have to take it to a dealer. Brand new and 10 seconds of service. Words cannot explain my level of anger and disappointment in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Randall Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product, terrible amazon service
customer_reviews.text: I put oil in this machine as instructed. Did not turn on the machine. Came back the next day and all oil on garage floor. Looked closely at the motor and found that the oil pan was not bolted to the engine. Can only get money back by getting this 70 pound unit to a third party seller, money not returned.
customer_reviews.author: David Caskey

customer_reviews.title: Push Button Start
customer_reviews.text: Use it for sidewalks, patios etc. As a senior I found my old power washer with a broken key start was getting harder and harder to pull start. The button start is super. This works well as a power washer and I like the built in soap dish for soaking and car washing.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne F Bentel

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality control
customer_reviews.text: When first using product I found that the oil fill tube, which is plastic, was warped to the point that when the engine was started it would blow oil all over the engine. Also after a few minutes of running, bolts that hold the engine and pump to the frame-were not even hand tight causing one of the bolts to fall out. I am totally disgusted with quality control. I am reserving further judgement to see if seller will forward parts.
customer_reviews.author: cliffrich@optonline.

customer_reviews.title: Electric start takes several attempts
customer_reviews.text: I like the electric start, which is what sold me on the washer, when it works. It takes several cycles before it starts which runs down the battery and before you know it, the battery needs charging. Luckily, it still has the pull start capability. Otherwise a good machine.
customer_reviews.author: William Garigen

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and power full
customer_reviews.text: The unit started right up and was simple to use. I like the fact it has a pull start if electronic fails. I will use it a lot this month. The pollen in Texas is bad. For the price I hope it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: C. Dickerson

customer_reviews.title: Love the electric start
customer_reviews.text: Very nice pressure washer, love the electric start . Battery seems to last well have started 12 times so far on single charge. I don't much care for the hose, but I have a few spares. The hose does have a tendency to pinch off water flow. It kinks somewhat easy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great machine
customer_reviews.text: Had neck surgery and can’t pull start. Electric start wonderful. I can now use it with out begging someone to start it or pull start my self and hurting for several days. Plenty of power
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Great power washer
customer_reviews.text: Great for all things residential. The electric start is great and the deck cleaning attachment is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: NB

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful and transformed our back wall. We didn't realize just how dirty it was until this powrrwasher cleaned it. Now people asked us if we got a new retaining wall.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Electric start is awesome. This pressure washer is powerful enough for almost anything you need cleaned.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: starting coil went bad after 3 and one half months
customer_reviews.text: I like the job it does. I did not like the coil going bad after 3 and one half months. Had to buy a tester then a new coil. This should never happened. It does not say where the part is made. Other then this set back I like it. This is the first time I ever had a coil go bad on me in any engine, I, am 70.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Cox

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: This is easiest & best power washer l’ve owned, quality product for a great price
customer_reviews.author: BILL  H.

customer_reviews.title: battery an box
customer_reviews.text: battery last less then year $80.00, replace 2 time. the battery holder less then then 2 year.
customer_reviews.author: jane easton

customer_reviews.title: Much Better Than Some of the Reviews I Read
customer_reviews.text: It is very easy to move and works exactly as advertised. The rechargeable battery for starting works amazingly well.
customer_reviews.author: K S Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Enjoy using it.. Came on time package nice.. Works great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: t will not pick up the soap solution from its reservoir.... John
customer_reviews.author: John B.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this. Use it with circular attachment and cleans our composite deck thoroughly. Used on the brick and mortar on our house and makes it look awesome.
customer_reviews.author: TanyaM1030

customer_reviews.title: Broken....................
customer_reviews.text: Opened box after waiting 5 weeks and found several broken parts. Returning for refund!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Electric start works well
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Electric start works well. The only concern are the instructions regarding the soap function. Not quite clear
customer_reviews.author: Peter Durand

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Got this and was using it within two hours. Battery charged very fast, assembly so easy and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Loretta Kibodeaux

customer_reviews.title: Damaged Battery Charger
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived last week and Charger for the battery was damaged and un operable. Looking to recieve a replacement battery charger. I am hopeful that this was the only damage that occured.
customer_reviews.author: Carter

customer_reviews.title: electric start is very important to me as well as the washer itself !
customer_reviews.text: Very nice washer !! MUCH easier on my back !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: No 30 foot hose.
customer_reviews.text: Everything works great including the electric start. My only complaint is that it was described as having a 30 foot long hose. It has a 25 foot hose.
customer_reviews.author: Giles C.

customer_reviews.title: Battery start also a big plus as my wife has arthritis and can no longer pull the rope to start.
customer_reviews.text: Used for general cleaning around the house and pool house. I love the broom as it contains the overspray while finishing the job.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Elderly Parents to use, They love it's easy start feature.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Easy to start
customer_reviews.text: This was what we needed. Was very easy to start. ESP as I am getting older and shoulders do not like to pull start things!!!
customer_reviews.author: david clark

customer_reviews.title: The power washer starts every time.
customer_reviews.text: Worked above expectations. Took the old stain off my deck boards in no time.the electric start is beautiful. Rate it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Paul dauria

customer_reviews.title: Worst purchase in my Amazon history
customer_reviews.text: Worst purchase in my Amazon history..parts missing ,parts broken, electric start was total failure...sending it back thankfully and washing my hands of it after 3 days of chaos
customer_reviews.author: Scott W.

customer_reviews.title: I don't like it at all does not work no pressure can ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't like it at all does not work no pressure can not do a 20ft deck the pressure some times the there go the water pressure all most shuts it self off then it will come on with a bang then it will do the same thing cant even do my deck or house should have never got this bad buy if I see a generac name on it I wont buy it thank you for a bad washer
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Generac 7143 eStart PW Kit
product_meta.description: Style:3100PSI E- Start Kit 50-State/CSAFeaturing effortless electric start capabilities & flexible performance settings, the Generac 7143 3100 PSI residential grade pressure washer kit with electric start is SIMPLE TO START & EASY TO USE. Equipped with a li-ion battery to hold charges for up to 18 months at a time, the 3100 PSI pressure washer also features an easy-to-access detergent tank & vertical axial cam pump with extended connections for trouble-free assembly & enhanced cleaning results. To apply the right amount of pressure for cleaning each unique surface, Generac powerful spray gun conveniently places the ability to switch between four application settings at your fingertips. This pressure washer kit includes a 12" power broom & a soap Blaster to help with all your cleaning needs. The 12" power broom is equipped with high pressure nozzles to clean 4x faster than standard nozzles. The power broom is ideal for decks, patios, driveways & sidewalks. Generac high pressure soap Blaster nozzle sprays soap 3x faster than a standard nozzle tip to penetrate tough stains & improve cleaning results. 2 year limited warranty.
feature_bullets: ONE TOUCH PUSH START - electric start with auto-choke provides reliable, hassle-free startups
LI-ION BATTERY and charger included - Battery holds charge for up to 18 months
POWERDIAL SPRAY GUN - easily adjust the pressure needed between four different tasks - car, wood, concrete and soap - at your fingertips
4 quick-change nozzles included - 0 Degree, 25 Degree, 40 Degree, soap

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars228 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
